columns.thing_id: The unique identifier for each thing.
columns.organization_id: The identifier linking each thing to its organization.
columns.Type_of_Thing_Code: The category classification of the thing.
columns.service_type_code: The code indicating the type of service offered.
columns.service_details: The specific details regarding the service satisfaction.

Things.table_description: The table records various things and their associated services.

columns.customer_id: The unique identifier for each customer.
columns.customer_details: The information detailing each customer's profile.

Customers.table_description: The table records customer information for local government services.

columns.property_id: The unique identifier for each property.
columns.property_type_code: The code defining the type of property.
columns.property_address: The address where the property is located.
columns.other_details: The additional information regarding the property.

Properties.table_description: The table holds records of properties in the local government area.

columns.resident_id: The unique identifier for each resident.
columns.property_id: The identifier linking the resident to their property.
columns.date_moved_in: The date when the resident moved into the property.
columns.date_moved_out: The date when the resident moved out of the property.
columns.other_details: The additional information regarding the resident.

Residents.table_description: The table records residents and their property occupancy details.

columns.organization_id: The unique identifier for each organization.
columns.parent_organization_id: The identifier of the parent organization, if applicable.
columns.organization_details: The detailed information about each organization.

Organizations.table_description: The table holds records of organizations within the local government structure.

columns.Customer_Event_Note_ID: The unique identifier for each customer event note.
columns.Customer_Event_ID: The identifier linking to the associated customer event.
columns.service_type_code: The code indicating the type of service related to the note.
columns.resident_id: The unique identifier for the resident associated with the note.
columns.property_id: The unique identifier for the property linked to the note.
columns.date_moved_in: The date when the resident moved into the property.

Customer_Event_Notes.table_description: The table records notes related to customer events and their details.

columns.Customer_Event_ID: The unique identifier for each customer event.
columns.customer_id: The identifier linking the customer to the event.
columns.date_moved_in: The date when the resident moved into the property.
columns.property_id: The identifier linking each event to the associated property.
columns.resident_id: The unique identifier for the resident involved in the event.
columns.thing_id: The identifier linking the event to a specific thing.

Customer_Events.table_description: The table records customer events related to residents and properties.

columns.service_id: The unique identifier for each service.
columns.organization_id: The identifier linking the service to its organization.
columns.service_type_code: The code defining the type of service provided.
columns.service_details: The satisfaction level regarding the service received.

Services.table_description: The table records various services offered by local government organizations.

columns.resident_id: The unique identifier for each resident involved in the service.
columns.service_id: The unique identifier for each service requested by the resident.
columns.date_moved_in: The date when the resident moved into the property.
columns.property_id: The unique identifier for the property linked to the resident.
columns.date_requested: The date when the service request was made.
columns.date_provided: The date when the requested service was provided.
columns.other_details: The additional information regarding the service request.

Residents_Services.table_description: The table records services requested and provided to residents.

columns.thing_id: The unique identifier for each thing's status record.
columns.Date_and_Date: The timestamp indicating when the status was recorded.
columns.Status_of_Thing_Code: The code representing the current status of the thing.

Timed_Status_of_Things.table_description: The table tracks the status of things over specific time intervals.

columns.thing_id: The unique identifier for each thing's location record.
columns.Date_and_Time: The timestamp indicating when the location was recorded.
columns.Location_Code: The code representing the recorded location of the thing.

Timed_Locations_of_Things.table_description: The table tracks the historical locations of things at specific times.
